user.title: Configuration MCP Server
user.description:
This integration exposes REST API endpoints and an MCP server for managing Home Assistant resources.

After setup, use the Configure button to customize which APIs are enabled.

Documentation: [{docs_url}]({docs_url})

oauth_restart_required.title: Restart Required for OAuth

You have enabled OAuth authentication for the MCP server. A restart is required for this change to take effect.

After restarting, browser-based MCP clients will be able to authenticate via OAuth.

dashboards.title: Lovelace Dashboards
dashboards.description:
Configure dashboard management with granular permissions.

**Endpoint:** `/api/config_mcp/dashboards`

data_description.dashboards_read: List dashboards, get metadata and configuration
data_description.dashboards_delete: Delete dashboards (cannot delete default or YAML dashboards)
data_description.dashboards_validate: Validate that entities in dashboard configs exist. 'none' = skip, 'warn' = accept but return warnings, 'strict' = reject if missing

mcp_server.title: MCP Server
mcp_server.description:
Configure the Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for AI assistants like Claude Code.

**Endpoint:** `https://YOUR_HA_URL/api/config_mcp/mcp`

**Token Authentication (recommended):**
```
claude mcp add --transport http config-mcp \
  https://YOUR_HA_URL/api/config_mcp/mcp \
  --header "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_LONG_LIVED_TOKEN"
```

**OAuth Authentication:**
If OAuth is enabled below, you can authenticate interactively:
```
claude mcp add --transport http config-mcp \
  https://YOUR_HA_URL/api/config_mcp/mcp
```
Then run `/mcp` in Claude Code and select "Authenticate" to login via browser.

**OAuth Status:** {oidc_status}

data_description.mcp_server: Exposes 36+ tools for dashboards, automations, scripts, scenes, entities, devices, areas, integrations, services, and logs via MCP protocol

data_description.logs_read: Allow MCP clients to read Home Assistant logs for debugging and verification

data_description.automations_read: List automations, get automation config and state
data_description.automations_update: Update automation config, enable/disable, and trigger automations

data_description.scripts_read: List scripts, get script config and state
data_description.scripts_update: Update script config, run and stop scripts

data_description.scenes_read: List scenes, get scene config and entities

categories.title: Categories & Labels
categories.description:
Configure category and label management for organizing automations, scripts, and other resources.

**Endpoints:**
- `/api/config_mcp/categories/{scope}`
- `/api/config_mcp/labels`

data_description.categories_read: List categories by scope (automation, script, helper)
data_description.categories_create: Create new categories for organizing resources
data_description.labels_read: List all labels for cross-scope tagging
data_description.labels_create: Create new labels for tagging resources
data_description.labels_update: Update label names, icons, colors, and descriptions
data_description.labels_delete: Delete labels (items will have label removed)
